data.name: No Anglerfish
data.detailed_description:
In this exciting and fun adventure game, you awaken on a desert island with no knowledge of who you are, or how you arrived. Explore and unlock surrounding islands by playing the mysteriously powerful arcade machines spread throughout the lands. If you love diabolical puzzles, witty dialogue and easter eggs galore, you'll love No Anglerfish!

Make friends (or don't!) to learn EVEN more secrets and earn bonuses!

Achieve your destiny while progressively exercising your brain power. But trust us, you'll be scratching your head in no time.

Our first Steam Release has us very excited to share this unique and engaging adventure!

data.short_description: You awaken on a desert island with no knowledge of who you are, or how you arrived there. Explore and unlock surrounding islands by playing the mysteriously powerful arcade machines spread throughout the lands.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: VGA
  • Storage: 22 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Very light on resources.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Pentium+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VGA and up
  • Storage: 64 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
